pages.text: An API giving access to the robot's sensors$(br)$(bold)getBrightness()$() -> an integer between 0 and 15 indicating the light level of the robot's location$(br)$(bold)getSeenEntities()$() -> a list of $(l:igrobotics:programming/sensor_api#entity_object)entity objects$() of all entities the robot can currently see

pages.title: Entity Object
pages.text: $(bold)getName()$() -> the entity's name$()$(br)$(bold)getUUID()$() -> the entity's UUID$(br)$(bold)getType()$() -> the entity's type as a string
